languages.text: "И чего нас сюда пригнали? Радоваться? Да я б и дома победе порадовалась..." {n}Пожилая женщина — та самая, которую вы {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}спасли{/d} от обезумевшего мужа среди прочих заложников — ковыляет к вам.{/n}

"What was the point of herding us here? Celebrating? I could've just as well celebrated at home..." {n}An elderly woman — the one you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}saved{/d} along with other hostages from her crazed husband — shuffles toward you.{/n}
languages.original_text: "И чего нас сюда пригнали? Радоваться? Да я б и дома победе порадовалась..." {n}Пожилая женщина — та самая, которую вы {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}спасли{/d} от обезумевшего мужа среди прочих заложников — ковыляет к вам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "What was the point of herding us here? Celebrating? I could've just as well celebrated the victory at home..." {n}An elderly woman — the one you saved, along with other hostages, from her crazed husband — shuffles toward you.{/n}

"What was the point of herding us here? Celebrating? I could've just as well celebrated at home..." {n}An elderly woman — the one you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}saved{/d} along with other hostages from her crazed husband — shuffles toward you.{/n}

languages.text: "Warum wurden wir hierher getrieben? Zum Feiern? Ich hätte auch zu Hause feiern können ..." {n}Eine alte Frau geht auf dich zu – die Frau, die du zusammen mit anderen Geiseln vor ihrem wahnsinnigen Mann {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}gerettet hast{/d}.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What was the point of herding us here? Celebrating? I could've just as well celebrated at home..." {n}An elderly woman — the one you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}saved{/d} along with other hostages from her crazed husband — shuffles toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Warum wurden wir hierher getrieben? Zum Feiern? Ich hätte auch zu Hause feiern können ..." {n}Eine alte Frau geht auf dich zu — die Frau, die du zusammen mit anderen Geiseln vor ihrem wahnsinnigen Mann gerettet hast.{/n}

languages.text: « Quel était l'intérêt de nous rassembler ici ? Pour faire la fête ? J'aurais aussi bien pu faire ça chez moi... » {n}Une femme âgée, celle que vous avez {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}sauvée{/d} de son mari fou en même temps que d'autres otages, claudique jusqu'à vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What was the point of herding us here? Celebrating? I could've just as well celebrated at home..." {n}An elderly woman — the one you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}saved{/d} along with other hostages from her crazed husband — shuffles toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Quel était l'intérêt de nous rassembler ici ? Pour faire la fête ? J'aurais aussi bien pu faire ça chez moi... » {n}Une femme âgée, celle que vous avez sauvée de son mari fou en même temps que d'autres otages, claudique jusqu'à vous.{/n}

languages.text: “把我们带到这里有什么意义？庆祝吗？可我在家里也一样能庆祝……”{n}那个面熟的老妇人朝你走来，身边簇拥着当时其他的人质，你曾将这些人从她疯狂的丈夫手中{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}拯救{/d}出来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What was the point of herding us here? Celebrating? I could've just as well celebrated at home..." {n}An elderly woman — the one you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}saved{/d} along with other hostages from her crazed husband — shuffles toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “把我们带到这里有什么意义？庆祝吗？可我在家里也一样能庆祝……”{n}那个面熟的老妇人朝你走来，身边簇拥着当时其他的人质，你曾将这些人从她疯狂的丈夫手中拯救出来。{/n}

languages.text: 「私たちをここに集めてどうしろって言うの？お祝だって？家で祝ってもいいじゃない…」{n}年配のその人は…他の人質と共に狂った夫から{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}救った{/d}女性だ。足を引きずりながらこちらの方へやってくる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What was the point of herding us here? Celebrating? I could've just as well celebrated at home..." {n}An elderly woman — the one you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}saved{/d} along with other hostages from her crazed husband — shuffles toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私たちをここに集めてどうしろって言うの？お祝だって？家で祝ってもいいじゃない…」{n}年配のその人は…他の人質と共に狂った夫から救った女性だ。足を引きずりながらこちらの方へやってくる。{/n}

languages.text: «¿Qué sentido tenía reunirnos aquí? ¿Celebrar? Podría haberlo celebrado en casa...». {n}Una anciana, a la que {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}salvaste{/d} junto a otros rehenes de su marido enloquecido, se arrastra hacia ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What was the point of herding us here? Celebrating? I could've just as well celebrated at home..." {n}An elderly woman — the one you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}saved{/d} along with other hostages from her crazed husband — shuffles toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué sentido tenía reunirnos aquí? ¿Celebrar? Podría haberlo celebrado en casa...». {n}Una anciana, a la que salvaste junto a otros rehenes de su marido enloquecido, se arrastra hacia ti.{/n}

languages.text: "Bizi buraya sürüklemenizin âlemi neydi? Kutlama mı? Evde de yapardım onu." {n}Yaşlıca biri kör topal sana doğru yaklaşıyor. Diğer rehinelerle beraber, delirmiş kocasının elinden {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}kurtardığın{/d} kadın bu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What was the point of herding us here? Celebrating? I could've just as well celebrated at home..." {n}An elderly woman — the one you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}saved{/d} along with other hostages from her crazed husband — shuffles toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bizi buraya toplama sebebiniz nedir? Kutlama mı? Evde de kutlama yapardık..." {n}Sapkın kocasından diğer rehinelerle birlikte kurtardığın yaşlı bir kadın, sana usulca yaklaşıyor.{/n}
